title: LF plat3+ adc
body: you need to wreck hard dont want an adc who farms to get ready for 5v5s need to understand how to smash lanes to pieces. add me in game to play looking to hit plat on this acct b4 i go to bed

replies.body:
Sup Main, not a smurf but add me if you at least want to try out a couple games. Always willing to learn as well.

na.op.gg/summoner/userName=9tt2
